main event: Observation of a very bright luminous object made at approximately 22:30 on 22 June 1952 in Minneapolis.
interesting points: The object was observed at about 45,000 feet altitude,The luminous object was moving at a very high rate of speed,The object changed direction and then disappeared,Several smaller objects were also observed in the vicinity during the sighting,The report was conducted under Project Blue Book by Military Air Intelligence.
